page.title: New Fat-Busting Microwave Oven Unveiled
page.text: TOKYO (Reuters) - Eyeing up that juicy steak but worried about your waistline? Japanese electronics maker Sharp Corp. <A HREF="http://www.reuters.co.uk/financeQuoteLookup.jhtml?ticker=6753.T qtype=sym infotype=info qcat=news">6753.T</A> says it has developed a new fat-busting microwave oven that can melt some of your worries away.
